bridge.toolkit.util
Class Keys

java.lang.Object
  bridge.toolkit.util.Keys

public class Keys
extends java.lang.Object

The static values of the keys to be used in the Context class.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String CP_PACKAGE
          File that represents the directory that is being used to build the SCORM Content Package.
static java.lang.String RESOURCE_PACKAGE
          String that represents the location of the resource package that contains all the S1000D files referenced in the SCPM to be included in the SCORM Content Package.
static java.lang.String SCPM_FILE
          String that represents the location of the S1000D SCPM file that is being converted into a SCORM Content Package.
static java.lang.String URN_MAP
          The urn_resource_map.xml file that provides a way to map all of the URN values for the resources to the file names.
static java.lang.String XML_SOURCE
          The imsmanifest.xml file that is generated from the SCPM.
